Control.Name: input_b_ShowPlayerNameplate
Control.Tooltip: Uncheck to hide your own nameplate.

Control.Name: input_b_DistanceScaling
Control.Tooltip: Scale the namepaltes based on distance to the unit.

Control.Name: input_n_Distance
Control.Tooltip: This field will set the range at which the nameplates begin to show.

Control.Name: input_b_HideName
Control.Tooltip: Hide the Name and Title in the PDA nameplate.

Control.Name: input_b_HideTitle
Control.Tooltip: Shows only the name in the PDA nameplate.

Control.Name: input_n_OffsetX
Control.Tooltip: This field will horizontally offset the nameplates.

Control.Name: input_n_OffsetY
Control.Tooltip: This field will vertically offset the nameplates.
Changing this requires a UI reload to take effect.
Changing this requires a UI reload to take effect.

Control.Name: btn_ResetDefaults_Nameplates
Control.Tooltip: Resets all colors to defaults.

Control.Name: btn_ClearCache
Control.Tooltip: Clear RPCore Cache. WARNING! Will clear all cached player data (excluding yours).

Control.Name: input_b_RoleplayToggle1
Control.Tooltip: Check to flag yourself as in character.

Control.Name: input_b_RoleplayToggle2
Control.Tooltip: Check to flag yourself as avialable for contact.

Control.Name: input_b_RoleplayToggle3
Control.Tooltip: Check to flag yourself as involved in an event currently.

Control.Name: wnd_Counter
Control.Tooltip: Character Limit

Control.Text: PDA Profile editor lets you set data points about your character, including physical data and an optional short physical description.
Control.Name: Window1

Control.Text: The description box is limited to 250 characters. This is a place for an elevator pitch of your character's physical appearance.
Control.Name: Window2

Control.Text: PDA Profile Browser allows you to review character profiles of those you have encountered recently.
Control.Name: Window1

Control.Text: Double click a name to view their profile.
Control.Name: Window2
btn_commitChanges
Control.Tooltip: Save Changes.

Control.Name: btn_cancelChanges
Control.Tooltip: Cancel Changes.

Control.Name: input_b_PublicHistory
Control.Tooltip: Check this box to allow others to see your Biography entry.

Control.Text: PDA Bio editor lets you use markup styles similar to HTML and BBCode to display rich text information. Use the buttons at the top to add tags. The cursor should be automaticly placed inbewteen the tags, so you just start typing.
Control.Name: Window1

Control.Text: The following at the avialable markup tags:
Control.Name: Window2

Control.Text: {h1}, {h2}, {h3}, {p}, {li} are the text markup. They need a closing tag to complete. IE: {/h1}, {/p}
Control.Name: Window3

Control.Text: Also avilable is {hr} which will place a horizontal line across the page. This does not require a closing tag.
Control.Name: Window4

Control.Text: PDA Character sheet displays the profile information of a character.
Control.Name: Window1

Control.Text: Use the tabs at the bottom to toggle profile info and character history (if available.)
Control.Name: Window2
